Title: The FORTE Knowledge Refinement System
Body: MIME-Version: 1.0 Server: CERN/3.0 Date: Tuesday, 07-Jan-97 15:55:52 GMT Content-Type: text/html Content-Length: 2765 Last-Modified: Monday, 11-Dec-95 16:47:09 GMT The FORTE Knowledge Refinement System FORTE FORTE (First Order Revision of Theories from Examples) is a machine learning system for modifiying a first-order Horn-clause domain theory to fit a set of training examples.
